title: Gallery Talk: There’s No Place Like Home
hero_caption: <p>Vincent van Gogh. <em>The Bedroom</em>, 1889. Helen Birch Bartlett Memorial Collection.&nbsp;</p>
description:
What makes a place feel like home? Is home where we come from, where we are, or where we want to end up? Join museum educator Paulina Lopez to unpack our understanding of comfort, placehood, and belonging as we explore depictions of home throughout the galleries.
